vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀστοχ-έω,
miss the mark, miss, τοῦ συμφέροντος[Refs 2nd c.BC+]; fail, περί τινος[Refs 2nd c.BC+]; περὶ τὴν πίστιν, τὴν ἀλήθειαν, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to wander away, miss the mark; to turn to, deviate from
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to wander away, miss the mark; to turn to, deviate from
primarily to miss the mark; metaphorically to err, deviate, wander away, swerve from, 1Tim. 1:6; 6:21; 2Tim. 2:18*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: perder el camino, desviarse del camino, descarriarse
